tool_description: Updates work order status, progress, and completion details with real-time tracking and documentation.

new_status.description: New status: pending, in_progress, completed, on_hold, cancelled

completion_notes.description: Notes about work performed or issues encountered

technician_id.description: ID of technician performing the work

error_messages: Work order not found: The provided work_order_id does not exist.
Invalid status: Use one of [pending, in_progress, completed, on_hold, cancelled].
Invalid progress percentage: progress_percentage must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid labor hours: actual_labor_hours must be a positive number.
Status transition error: Cannot change from current status to requested new_status.
usage: Provide work_order_id and new_status, optionally add progress details, labor hours, notes, and parts information. Updates work order with current information.

previous_status.description: Previous status of the work order
